headline: A Ghostly Story Hits Off-Key Notes
abstract: A young violinist inherits a cursed piece of music in this slow-moving ghost story.
lead_paragraph: A batty composer, a fusty French chateau, missing children — and that old faithful, the Antichrist — add up to a whole lot of silliness in “The Sonata,” a leaden Gothic ghost story whose high-gloss imagery fails to disguise its low-energy plot.
